data.name: DefaultLookAndFeelEnableBonusSkins
data.value: Registers the Bonus Skins for runtime use.

data.name: BadgeProperties
data.value: Provides access to advanced Badge settings.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseTextOptions
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.TextOptions property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseImage
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.Image property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.ForeColor property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseFont
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.Font property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseBorderColor
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.BorderColor property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsUseBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the AppearanceObject.BackColor property value.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsExHighPriority
data.value: Gets or sets whether the settings specified by the current appearance object have the highest priority.

data.name: AppearanceOptionsEmpty
data.value: Returns an AppearanceOptions object whose settings are not initialized.

data.name: AppearanceObjectTextOptions
data.value: Provides access to the appearance object's text options.

data.name: AppearanceObjectOptions
data.value: Provides access to the appearance object's options.

data.name: AppearanceObjectImage
data.value: Gets or sets the background image.

data.name: AppearanceObjectGradientMode
data.value: Gets or sets the background gradient's direction.

data.name: AppearanceObjectForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the foreground color.

data.name: AppearanceObjectFontStyleDelta
data.value: Gets or sets a style by which the font is modified.

data.name: AppearanceObjectFontSizeDelta
data.value: Gets or sets an integer value by which the font size is adjusted.

data.name: AppearanceObjectFont
data.value: Gets or sets the font used to paint the text.

data.name: AppearanceObjectExOptions
data.value: Provides access to the appearance object's options.

data.name: AppearanceObjectEmptyAppearance
data.value: Returns an empty appearance object.

data.name: AppearanceObjectDefaultMenuFont
data.value: Gets and sets the font used to display text on menus.

data.name: AppearanceObjectDefaultFont
data.value: Gets or sets the default font for controls.

data.name: AppearanceObjectControlAppearance
data.value: Gets the default appearance settings which are used to paint 3-D elements in Windows.

data.name: AppearanceObjectBorderColor
data.value: Gets or sets the border color.

data.name: AppearanceObjectBackColor2
data.value: Gets or sets the end color of the background's gradient brush.

data.name: AppearanceObjectBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the background color.

data.name: AdornerUIManagerOwner
data.value: Gets or sets the control that owns this AdornerUIManager.

data.name: AdornerUIManagerElements
data.value: Provides zero-based indexed access to AdornerElements of any type owned by this AdornerUIManager.

data.name: AdornerUIManagerBadgeProperties
data.value: Provides access to properties that affect all Badge elements within this AdornerUIManager.

data.name: AdornerUIManagerBadgeAppearance
data.value: Provides access to appearance settings common to all Badge elements within this AdornerUIManager.

data.name: AdornerElementVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not this AdornerElement is visible.

data.name: AdornerElementTargetElement
data.value: Gets or sets the UI element to which this AdornerElement is bound.

data.name: DXMenuItemCollection
data.value: Gets the menu item collection which owns the current menu item.

data.name: DXMenuItemCaption
data.value: Specifies the text displayed within the menu item.

data.name: DXMenuItemBeginGroup
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current menu item starts a group.

data.name: DXMenuCheckItemChecked
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the menu item is checked.

data.name: DefaultToolTipControllerDefaultController
data.value: Returns the object which represents the Default ToolTipController.

data.name: DefaultLookAndFeelLookAndFeel
data.value: Gets the UserLookAndFeel object defining Default LookAndFeel settings.

data.name: DXMenuItemEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the menu item is enabled.

data.name: DXMenuItemImage
data.value: Gets or sets an image displayed within the menu item,

data.name: DXMenuItemImageDisabled
data.value: Gets or sets an image representing the menu item in the disabled state.

data.name: DXMenuItemLargeImage
data.value: Gets or sets a large image for the current menu item.

data.name: DXMenuItemLargeImageDisabled
data.value: Gets or sets a large image displayed in the current menu item when it is in the disabled state.

data.name: DXMenuItemShortcut
data.value: Gets or sets a shortcut displayed within the menu item

data.name: DXMenuItemShowHotKeyPrefix
data.value: Gets or sets whether the ampersand ('&') character, when it is found in the item's DXMenuItem.Caption, acts as a shortcut prefix, or it is displayed as is.

data.name: DXMenuItemTag
data.value: Gets or sets the data associated with the menu item.

data.name: DXMenuItemVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the menu item is visible.

data.name: DXSubMenuItemItems
data.value: Gets a collection of items displayed when the current submenu is expanded.

data.name: FlyoutPanelButtonClick
data.value: Occurs when a button in the FlyoutPanel's built-in button panel is clicked.

data.name: FlyoutPanelHidden
data.value: Fires after the panel has been hidden.

data.name: FlyoutPanelHiding
data.value: Fires when a panel is about to be hidden.

data.name: FlyoutPanelOptions
data.value: Contains the FlyoutPanel's view and behavior options.

data.name: FlyoutPanelOptionsBeakPanel
data.value: Provides access to the settings applied to the current FlyoutPanel displayed as a beak form.

data.name: FlyoutPanelOptionsButtonPanel
data.value: Provides access to the set of options applied to the built-in button panel.

data.name: FlyoutPanelOwnerControl
data.value: Gets or sets the FlyoutPanel's owner, relative to which the panel is displayed.

data.name: FlyoutPanelParentForm
data.value: Gets or sets the form that owns this FlyoutPanel.

data.name: FlyoutPanelShowing
data.value: Fires when the panel is about to be displayed.

data.name: FlyoutPanelShown
data.value: Fires after the panel has been displayed.

data.name: FlyoutPanelToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and content of tooltips displayed by buttons in the button panel.

data.name: GraphicsCacheCache
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GraphicsCacheClipInfo
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GraphicsCacheGraphics
data.value: Gets an object that serves as the painting surface and provides painting facilities.

data.name: GraphicsCacheOffset
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GraphicsCacheOffsetEx
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GraphicsCachePaint
data.value: Gets or sets a DevExpress.Utils.Paint.XPaint object.

data.name: GraphicsCachePaintArgs
data.value: Gets an object providing information for painting.

data.name: GraphicsCacheTransformMatrix
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: GroupControlAllowBorderColorBlending
data.value: Gets or sets whether to colorize the group caption and border according to the BorderColor setting in skinning paint schemes.

data.name: GroupControlAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether an image within the GroupControl's caption should be painted using the control's foreground color.

data.name: GroupControlAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML tags can be used to format the control's GroupControl.Text.

data.name: GroupControlAppearanceCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the group's caption.

data.name: GroupControlCaptionImage
data.value: Gets or sets the image to display within the group's caption area.

data.name: GroupControlCaptionImageLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the relative position of an image within the group caption.

data.name: GroupControlCaptionImagePadding
data.value: Gets or sets the outer indents for the image within the group caption, in pixels.

data.name: GroupControlCaptionImageUri
data.value: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) that specifies the image assigned for this GroupControl.

data.name: GroupControlCaptionLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the group control's caption.

data.name: GroupControlCustomButtonChecked
data.value: Occurs whenever a check button from the GroupControl.CustomHeaderButtons collection is checked.

data.name: GroupControlCustomButtonClick
data.value: Occurs whenever a push button from the GroupControl.CustomHeaderButtons collection is clicked.

data.name: GroupControlCustomButtonUnchecked
data.value: Occurs whenever a check button from the GroupControl.CustomHeaderButtons collection is unchecked.

data.name: GroupControlCustomHeaderButtons
data.value: Provides access to the custom header buttons' collection.

data.name: GroupControlCustomHeaderButtonsLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the position of GroupControl.CustomHeaderButtons within this GroupControl.

data.name: GroupControlHtmlImages
data.value: Gets or sets a collection of images to be inserted into the control's caption (GroupControl.Text) using HTML tags.

data.name: GroupControlShowCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the group's caption is displayed.

data.name: GroupControlText
data.value: Gets or sets the GroupControl's text.

data.name: GroupControlToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and content of tooltips displayed by custom header buttons.

data.name: HScrollBarBaseScrollBarType
data.value: Gets the value indicating whether the scroll bar is horizontal or vertical.

data.name: ImageCollectionImages
data.value: Provides access to the collection of images.

data.name: ImageCollectionImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of images in the image collection.For the SharedImageCollection, this property specifies the size of images fetched from an image strip (at design time or via the AddImageStrip and AddImageStripVertical methods).

data.name: ImageCollectionIsDpiAware
data.value: Gets or sets the value that specifies that when requesting an image from the ImageCollection, another DPI-specific image corresponding to the requested image is returned instead.This feature is in effect if the requested image was loaded into the ImageCollection from the project resources.

data.name: ImageCollectionTransparentColor
data.value: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent.

data.name: ImagesCount
data.value: Gets the number of items in the collection.

data.name: ImagesIsFixedSize
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.

data.name: ImagesIsReadOnly
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

data.name: ImagesIsSynchronized
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).

data.name: ImagesKeys
data.value: Gets the collection of names assigned to the images in the current collection.

data.name: ImagesSyncRoot
data.value: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

data.name: KeyShortcutAltKeyName
data.value: Gets the name of the ALT key which is dependent upon the end-user's regional settings.

data.name: KeyShortcutControlKeyName
data.value: Gets the name of the CONTROL key which is dependent upon the end-user's regional settings.

data.name: KeyShortcutIsExist
data.value: Tests whether the current shortcut specifies a valid key combination.

data.name: KeyShortcutKey
data.value: Gets the shortcut used to activate particular functionality.

data.name: KeyShortcutShiftKeyName
data.value: Gets the name of the SHIFT key which is dependent upon the end-user's regional settings.

data.name: PanelControlAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the panel.

data.name: PanelControlBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the panel's background color.

data.name: PanelControlBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the panel's border style.

data.name: PanelControlContentImage
data.value: Gets or sets the group's background image that is displayed \"as is\", and can be aligned to any panel's edge.

data.name: PanelControlContentImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the content image's alignment within the panel.

data.name: PanelControlDisplayRectangle
data.value: Gets the bounds of the panel's client region.

data.name: PanelControlForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the panel's foreground color.

data.name: PanelControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings which control the panel's look and feel.

data.name: PanelControlText
data.value: Gets or sets the text associated with the panel control.

data.name: PanelControlUseDisabledStatePainter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control is painted grayed out, when it's in the disabled state.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseLargeChange
data.value: Gets or sets the increment applied to the ScrollBarBase.Value property when the scroll box is moved by a 'page'.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseLookAndFeel
data.value: Gets a value providing access to settings controlling the control's look and feel.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseMaximum
data.value: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the scrollable range.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseMinimum
data.value: Gets or sets the lower limit of the scrollable range.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseScroll
data.value: Fires when the scroll thumb has been moved either by a mouse or keyboard action.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseScrollBarAutoSize
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the scroll bar is automatically sized.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseScrollBarAutoSizeChanged
data.value: Fires after the ScrollBarBase.ScrollBarAutoSize property's value has been changed.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseSmallChange
data.value: Gets or sets the value by which the ScrollBarBase.Value property changes when the user presses one of the arrow keys or clicks one of the scroll-bar buttons.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can focus the scroll bar control using the TAB key.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseValue
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the scroll box's current position.

data.name: ScrollBarBaseValueChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after the ScrollBarBase.Value property has been changed.

data.name: SharedImageCollectionImageSource
data.value: Gets or sets the inner collection of images for the SharedImageCollection.

data.name: SkinManagerAllowFormSkins
data.value: Gets whether the form title bar skinning feature is enabled.

data.name: SkinManagerDefault
data.value: Provides access to the default skin manager.

data.name: SkinManagerSkins
data.value: Gets the collection of skins that are currently available for use in DevExpress controls.

data.name: SplitContainerControlCollapsed
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the panel referred to by the SplitContainerControl.CollapsePanel property is collapsed.

data.name: SplitContainerControlCollapsePanel
data.value: Gets or sets the panel that is automatically collapsed when clicking on a splitter.

data.name: SplitContainerControlFixedPanel
data.value: Gets or sets the fixed panel.

data.name: SplitContainerControlHorizontal
data.value: Gets or sets whether the panels are located one after another or one above another.

data.name: SplitContainerControlPanel1
data.value: Gets the left (or top) panel.

data.name: SplitContainerControlPanel2
data.value: Gets the right (or bottom) panel.

data.name: SplitContainerControlPanelVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the visibility of the panels.

data.name: SplitContainerControlShowCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the split container's caption is displayed.

data.name: SplitContainerControlSplitterPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the splitter's location.

data.name: SplitterControlAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the splitter.

data.name: SplitterControlBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the splitter's background color.

data.name: SplitterControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings which control the splitter's look and feel.

data.name: SuperToolTipAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML formatting is allowed in the current SuperToolTip object.

data.name: SuperToolTipDistanceBetweenItems
data.value: Specifies the distance between tooltip items.

data.name: SuperToolTipFixedTooltipWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tooltip's width is fixed or automatically adjusted to fit the tooltip's contents entirely.

data.name: SuperToolTipIsEmpty
data.value: Gets whether the SuperToolTip is empty.

data.name: SuperToolTipMaxWidth
data.value: Specifies the tooltip window's maximum width, in pixels.

data.name: SuperToolTipOwnerAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets whether HTML formatting in a SuperToolTip is allowed by the ToolTipController object that displays the current SuperToolTip object.

data.name: SuperToolTipPadding
data.value: Gets or sets padding within the SuperToolTip.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultOptions
data.value: Gets an object that specifies the default text options.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultOptionsCenteredWithEllipsis
data.value: Gets an object whose settings force text to be centered.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultOptionsMultiLine
data.value: Gets an object whose settings allow text to wrap.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultOptionsNoWrap
data.value: Gets an object whose settings prevent text from wrapping.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultOptionsNoWrapEx
data.value: Gets an object whose settings force text to be centered and prevent it from wrapping.

data.name: TextOptionsDefaultStringFormat
data.value: Gets an object that contains the default formatting settings.

data.name: TextOptionsHAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of text.

data.name: TextOptionsHotkeyPrefix
data.value: Gets or sets the hotkey prefix for the text.

data.name: TextOptionsTrimming
data.value: Gets or sets text trimming mode.

data.name: TextOptionsVAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of text.

data.name: TextOptionsWordWrap
data.value: Gets or sets text wrapping mode.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML formatting is supported in tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoIconType
data.value: Gets or sets the kind of predefined icon to display in a tooltip.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoImmediateToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets whether a tooltip will be displayed immediately or after a delay.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the interval that must pass before a tooltip is displayed.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoObject
data.value: Gets or sets an object which uniquely identifies the currently processed element.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoObjectBounds
data.value: Gets or sets the bounds of the object for which a tooltip is displayed.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoSuperTip
data.value: Gets or sets a SuperToolTip that will be displayed if the ToolTipControlInfo.ToolTipType property is set to SuperTip

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoText
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip's text.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoTitle
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip's title.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoToolTipImage
data.value: Gets or sets the image to display within the current tooltip.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoToolTipLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip location.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoToolTipPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip's position in screen coordinates.

data.name: ToolTipControlInfoToolTipType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of tooltip to be displayed.

data.name: ToolTipControllerActive
data.value: Gets or sets whether the component's functionality is enabled.

data.name: ToolTipControllerActiveObject
data.value: Returns the object that identifies which of the bound control's elements the tooltip is displayed for.

data.name: ToolTipControllerActiveObjectInfo
data.value: An object containing tooltip information for the current element of a bound control.

data.name: ToolTipControllerAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether HTML formatting tags can be used to format text in tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControllerAppearance
data.value: Gets or sets the settings that control the appearance of a tooltip's window and text.

data.name: ToolTipControllerAppearanceTitle
data.value: Provide the settings that control the appearance of a tooltip's title.

data.name: ToolTipControllerAutoPopDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip delay in milliseconds.

data.name: ToolTipControllerBeforeShow
data.value: Enables you to customize the text and settings of the tooltip before displaying it onscreen.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSize
data.value: Enables you to specify the position and size of the tooltip window.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSizeEventArgsPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the top left tooltip corner.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSizeEventArgsShowInfo
data.value: Gets the additional event data.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSizeEventArgsSize
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip dimensions.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSizeEventArgsTitle
data.value: Gets the tooltip's title.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCalcSizeEventArgsToolTip
data.value: Gets the text to be displayed within the tooltip.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCloseOnClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether a tooltip is closed when it's clicked.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCustomDraw
data.value: Enables a tooltip's window to be custom painted.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCustomDrawEventArgsBounds
data.value: Gets the bounding rectangle of the painted tooltip.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCustomDrawEventArgsCache
data.value: Gets an object which specifies the storage for the most used pens, fonts and brushes

data.name: ToolTipControllerCustomDrawEventArgsHandled
data.value: Gets or sets whether an event was handled, if it was handled the default actions are not required.

data.name: ToolTipControllerCustomDrawEventArgsShowInfo
data.value: Gets an object which provides the information required to paint a tooltip.

data.name: ToolTipControllerDefaultController
data.value: Gets the default ToolTipController used for displaying tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControllerEventArgsBaseSelectedControl
data.value: Gets or sets the control for which a tooltip controller's event is fired.

data.name: ToolTipControllerEventArgsBaseSelectedObject
data.value: Gets or sets the element of the control for which the tooltip should be displayed.

data.name: ToolTipControllerGetActiveObjectInfo
data.value: Allows you to provide custom tooltips for any element of a control that implements the IToolTipControlClient interface.

data.name: ToolTipControllerHyperlinkClick
data.value: Occurs when an end-user clicks a hyperlink within a control's tool-tip or super tool-tip.

data.name: ToolTipControllerIconSize
data.value: Gets or sets tooltip icon size.

data.name: ToolTipControllerIconType
data.value: Gets or sets tooltip icon type.

data.name: ToolTipControllerImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of an image to be displayed within tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControllerImageList
data.value: Gets or sets the source of the images that can be displayed within tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControllerInitialDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the initial tooltip delay in milliseconds.

data.name: ToolTipControllerReshowDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval that must pass before another hint is displayed if another hint is currently visible.

data.name: ToolTipControllerRounded
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tooltip's corners are rounded.

data.name: ToolTipControllerRoundRadius
data.value: Gets or sets the radius of the rounded corners of the tooltip window.

data.name: ToolTipControllerShowBeak
data.value: Tests whether callout beaks are displayed for hints.

data.name: ToolTipControllerShowShadow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tooltips are shown shadowed.

data.name: ToolTipControllerToolTipLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip location.

data.name: ToolTipControllerToolTipStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the look-and-feel of regular tooltips.

data.name: ToolTipControllerToolTipType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of tooltips displayed by the controller.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelActiveSkinName
data.value: Gets the name of the currently applied skin.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelActiveStyle
data.value: Gets the style currently applied.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelDefault
data.value: Gets the Default LookAndFeel object which should be used for painting controls when the UserLookAndFeel.UseDefaultLookAndFeel property is set to true.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelSkinName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a skin style.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style of the current UserLookAndFeel object.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelUseDefaultLookAndFeel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current object's settings are in effect.

data.name: UserLookAndFeelUseWindowsXPTheme
data.value: Gets or sets whether controls should be painted using the native Windows theme.

data.name: VScrollBarBaseScrollBarType
data.value: Gets the value indicating whether the scroll bar is horizontal or vertical.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerAfterApplyWorkspace
data.value: Occurs after a workspace was applied.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerAllowTransitionAnimation
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not changing workspaces within this WorkspaceManager should be followed by animation effects.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerBeforeApplyWorkspace
data.value: Occurs immediately after the ApplyWorkspace method is called.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerCloseStreamOnWorkspaceLoading
data.value: Gets or sets whether this WorkspaceManager should automatically close streams opened when loading workspaces.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerCloseStreamOnWorkspaceSaving
data.value: Gets or sets whether this WorkspaceManager should automatically close streams opened when saving workspaces.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerTargetControl
data.value: Gets or sets a control whose layout is managed by this WorkspaceManager.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerTransitionType
data.value: Gets or sets the transition animation that follows applying workspaces.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerWorkspaceAdded
data.value: Occurs whenever a new workspace was added to the WorkspaceManager.Workspaces collection.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerWorkspaceRemoved
data.value: Fires when a workspace was removed from the WorkspaceManager.Workspaces collection.

data.name: WorkspaceManagerWorkspaceSaved
data.value: Occurs after the SaveWorkspace method was called.

data.name: XtraFormAllowFormSkin
data.value: Gets or sets whether the form's title bar and borders are painted using the current skin. This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: XtraFormAllowMdiBar
data.value: Gets or sets whether an MDI bar is allowed for this form. This property is in effect for a parent MDI form, when the title bar skinning feature is enabled.

data.name: XtraFormAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the form.

data.name: XtraFormBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the background color of the form's client region.

data.name: XtraFormBackgroundImage
data.value: Specifies the background image for the form.

data.name: XtraFormBackgroundImageLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the ImageLayout enumeration.

data.name: XtraFormCloseBox
data.value: Gets or sets whether the form's Close button (x) is visible. This property is in effect when the Form Title Bar Skinning feature is enabled.

data.name: XtraFormFont
data.value: Gets or sets the form's font.

data.name: XtraFormForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the foreground color of the form's client region.

data.name: XtraFormHtmlImages
data.value: Gets or sets a collection of images to be inserted into the form's caption using HTML tags. This property is in effect when the Form Title Bar Skinning feature is enabled.

data.name: XtraFormLookAndFeel
data.value: Contains settings that specify the look and feel of the current form and all DevExpress controls placed on the form.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAllowTouchScroll
data.value: Gets or sets if end-users can scroll the XtraScrollableControl by dragging its content.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAlwaysScrollActiveControlIntoView
data.value: Gets or sets whether the XtraScrollableControl's view is automatically scrolled to completely display the active control if it is invisible, or partly visible.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAppearance
data.value: Gets the control's appearance settings.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAutoScroll
data.value: Gets or sets whether the XtraScrollableControl enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside its visible boundaries.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAutoScrollMargin
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlAutoScrollMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the control's background color.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlDisplayRectangle
data.value: Gets the rectangle that represents the XtraScrollableControl's view area.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlFireScrollEventOnMouseWheel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the XtraScrollableControl.Scroll event fires when using the mouse wheel.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the control's foreground color.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlInvertTouchScroll
data.value: Gets or sets whether the scroll direction is inverted when scrolling on touch devices via the pan gesture.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Gets the control's look and feel settings.

data.name: XtraScrollableControlScrollBarSmallChange
data.value: Gets or sets the distance the XtraScrollableControl's view is scrolled when the user clicks one of the scroll buttons.

data.name: XtraUserControlAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the user control.

data.name: XtraUserControlBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the user control's background color.

data.name: XtraUserControlFont
data.value: Gets or sets font settings applied to the control.

data.name: XtraUserControlForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the control's foreground color.

data.name: XtraUserControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Contains settings that specify the look and feel of the current XtraUserControl and all DevExpress controls placed on it.
